https://tmrev.io/movie/172543-Arn - The Full Story 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Arn, the son of a high-ranking Swedish nobleman is educated in a monastery and sent to the Holy Land as a knight templar to do penance for a forbidden love. This is the international cut of the two movies Arn: The Knight Templar and Arn: The Kingdom at Road's End. The movie is cut to fit a higher tempo, but lacks some of the details and depth of the original story. Arn - The Full Story
